alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 04 at 2:35AM PST until February 05 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusts to 70 mph are possible along Highway 95 near Walker Lake. Travel restrictions for high profile vehicles are likely.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items before winds increase which could blow these items away. Follow instructions on highway signs and do not attempt travel on restricted highways. Winds could be strong enough to push your vehicle out of your travel lane. Check with NDOT for the latest road information.
